alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Southern Hancock (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 21 at 1:51AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN ST. TAMMANY PARISH IN SOUTHEASTERN LOUISIANA AND CENTRAL HANCOCK COUNTIES THROUGH 215 AM CST... At 151 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Slidell, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Slidell, Bay St. Louis, Diamondhead, Pearl River, Kiln, Pearlington, Lacombe, Shoreline Park, Stennis Space Center, and Slidell Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 261 and 273. Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 16. Interstate 12 between mile markers 73 and 84. Interstate 59 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
